Quickstride follows Leo Prime carefully, being mindful of the terrain below=
 his hooves.   One wrong move could possibly cripple him if he were to frac=
ture a limb as was the case for equine animals.  

" I dunno about this.  I=
 better continue in robot mode.  One wrong move and it's curtains for me."
=

His passengers dismount as he shifts into robot mode.  Rattrap and Straigh=
t Shot appear to be comfortable with the decision and carry on normally.  T=
heir short stubby legs prove useful over dense vegetation and fallen tree s=
tumps.  Straight Shot stops for a moment and sniffs the area.  Rattrap does=
 the same. The rodent duo quickly catch a scent, and stay on it intensely. =
 

" Guys, over here, I just caught onto my brother's scent.  Battery fluid=
.. Oh no, he's bleeding.  I hope it's not serious."

Rattrap pulls out a si=
lver metallic scale from the ground.

" Ditto, but I dunno, look what I jus=
t found.  This has some serious damage on it, looks like it got ripped off =
the big guy as if he was fight'n someone.   HEY!   LOOK!  I WAS RIGHT!  THE=
RE WAS A BAAAAD BATTLE HERE ALL RIGHT!"

Quickstride rushes over and inspec=
ts the ground.

" Yep, confrontation confirmed, Sir!  Look at the ground, d=
ebris is kicked up all over the place, Rattrap found one of Tucson Prime's =
scales, mangled, and there's a bit of battery fluid on the ground.  Yikes w=
hat the pit did he run into?"

Straight Shot looks at the prints on the gro=
und.

" It's not a matter of what, it's a matter of who.  I know these trac=
ks, besides my brothers these other tracks here, they look like Grimlock's.=
  But why would he attack his own comrades?  I don't get it.  Tucson used t=
o work with him vorns ago, and they seemed to work well together.  I know T=
ucson never do anything ta hurt his feelings, because he stood up for Griml=
ock on occasion.  This isn't right at all."

Don't be envious of what you d=
on't have, be grateful for things you already posses.  Nothing is worth mor=
e than family and friends.

On Nov 2, 2011, at 12:35 PM, "supercyclonus" <s=
upercyclonus@...> wrote:

> As the party quickly moves away from the =
clearing and towards the jungle, the area foliage quickly becomes much dens=
er. As they are still following a trail they are still able to pass through=
 it relatively easily, but at the sides of the trail the brush and plants a=
re becoming thicker and greener. However as we have night still falling, th=
e way ahead is getting darker, and the gnarled tree limbs beginning to look=
 as much like claws as they do wood. 
> 
> For those who have chosen to fly=
. Before them would be what appears to be an a dark ocean of or dark green =
water complete with waves as the tops of tress move lazily in response to u=
nseen breezes. The sky itself is clear and bright, very little in the way o=
f cloud cover and the moon is just beginning to make itself seen as it rise=
s up over the horizon of trees. A casual gaze downward shows the rest of th=
e group walking along, wether in robot mode or beast mode, but a quick glan=
ce ahead showed that in very short order the group below will be harder and=
 harder to locate due to the every increasing density of the plant life. 
>=
 
> For those who were burrowing along underground, even their way was beco=
ming slowed with the massive entanglement of roots that sat just beneath th=
e surface of the ground. 
> 
> However for all teams there is one constant.=
 Within the space of a mile the communications go from crystal clear to non=
-existent. Even the IFF com-signal goes down, and everyone is restricted to=
 sensory recognition only. Even sensors are muffled somewhat, although visu=
al, audio and olfactory senses appear to be unaffected. 
> 
> At the front =
of the group on the ground LEO PRIME walked in beast mode, a lion stalking =
through the jungle, looking completely at home here. TORCA, who was in an a=
lmost nightmarerish fusion of elephant and killer whale walked next to him,=
 and on the other side was SANTON in his MAMMOTH beast mode. 
> 
> Around t=
hese three ranges the rest of the Maxmals, some in the air, like AIRHAMMER,=
 NOCTORRO and WINGCALIBER while there were others on the ground like BANTOR=
. 
> 
> Then again the PREDACONS were here too, making their presence felt =
as they flew and walked. SKYSHADOW was in the air in beast mode along with =
BUZZCLAW and INJECTOR, while QUICKSTRIKE and TERRORGATOR walked on the grou=
nd. 
> 
> "This way!" LEO PRIME said as he walked on. "The signal is coming=
 from this way." He was carrying the makeshift tracking device, its signal =
taking him darker and darker into the dark of the Jungle!
> 
> OOC: I am no=
t sure who is flying and who is walking. Most I can make assumptions on. Is=
 Hydras flying or walking, I am not sure if the Hydra has wings? Also is Bu=
zzsaw going to be flying above the trees or just below the treeline. Either=
 one is possible, although it will call for some fancy flying to stay below=
 as the trees get denser. 
> 
> (TAG)
> 
> Preston
> 
> 

--Apple-Mail-83-497113514

ld possibly cripple him if he were to fracture a limb as was the case for e=

I better continue in robot mode.  One wrong move and it's curtains for=

 over dense vegetation and fallen tree stumps.  Straight Shot stops fo=
r a moment and sniffs the area.  Rattrap does the same. The rodent duo=

v><div>" Guys, over here, I just caught onto my brother's scent.  Batt=
ery fluid.. Oh no, he's bleeding.  I hope it's not serious."</div><div=
><br></div><div>Rattrap pulls out a silver metallic scale from the ground.<=
/div><div><br></div><div>" Ditto, but I dunno, look what I just found. &nbs=
p;This has some serious damage on it, looks like it got ripped off the big =
guy as if he was fight'n someone.   HEY!   LOOK!  I WAS RIGH=
T!  THERE WAS A BAAAAD BATTLE HERE ALL RIGHT!"</div><div><br></div><di=
v>Quickstride rushes over and inspects the ground.</div><div><br></div><div=
>" Yep, confrontation confirmed, Sir!  Look at the ground, debris is k=
icked up all over the place, Rattrap found one of Tucson Prime's scales, ma=
ngled, and there's a bit of battery fluid on the ground.  Yikes what t=
he pit did he run into?"</div><div><br></div><div>Straight Shot looks at th=
e prints on the ground.</div><div><br></div><div>" It's not a matter of wha=
t, it's a matter of who.  I know these tracks, besides my brothers the=
se other tracks here, they look like Grimlock's.  But why would he att=
ack his own comrades?  I don't get it.  Tucson used to work with =
him vorns ago, and they seemed to work well together.  I know Tucson n=
ever do anything ta hurt his feelings, because he stood up for Grimlock on =
occasion.  This isn't right at all."</div><div><br>Don't be envious of=
 what you don't have, be grateful for things you already posses.  Noth=
ing is worth more than family and friends.</div><div><br>On Nov 2, 2011, at=
 12:35 PM, "supercyclonus" <<a href=3D"mailto:supercyclonus@...">s=
upercyclonus@...</a>> wrote:<br><br></div><div></div><blockquote t=
ype=3D"cite"><div>




<span style=3D"display:none"> </span>



    <d=
iv id=3D"ygrp-text">
      
      
      <p>As the party quickly moves away=
 from the clearing and towards the jungle, the area foliage quickly becomes=
 much denser. As they are still following a trail they are still able to pa=
ss through it relatively easily, but at the sides of the trail the brush an=
d plants are becoming thicker and greener. However as we have night still f=
alling, the way ahead is getting darker, and the gnarled tree limbs beginni=
ng to look as much like claws as they do wood. <br>
<br>
For those who have=
 chosen to fly. Before them would be what appears to be an a dark ocean of =
or dark green water complete with waves as the tops of tress move lazily in=
 response to unseen breezes. The sky itself is clear and bright, very littl=
e in the way of cloud cover and the moon is just beginning to make itself s=
een as it rises up over the horizon of trees. A casual gaze downward shows =
the rest of the group walking along, wether in robot mode or beast mode, bu=
t a quick glance ahead showed that in very short order the group below will=
 be harder and harder to locate due to the every increasing density of the =
plant life. <br>
<br>
For those who were burrowing along underground, even =
their way was becoming slowed with the massive entanglement of roots that s=
at just beneath the surface of the ground. <br>
<br>
However for all teams =
there is one constant. Within the space of a mile the communications go fro=
m crystal clear to non-existent. Even the IFF com-signal goes down, and eve=
ryone is restricted to sensory recognition only. Even sensors are muffled s=
omewhat, although visual, audio and olfactory senses appear to be unaffecte=
d. <br>
<br>
At the front of the group on the ground LEO PRIME walked in be=
ast mode, a lion stalking through the jungle, looking completely at home he=
re. TORCA, who was in an almost nightmarerish fusion of elephant and killer=
 whale walked next to him, and on the other side was SANTON in his MAMMOTH =
beast mode. <br>
<br>
Around these three ranges the rest of the Maxmals, so=
me in the air, like AIRHAMMER, NOCTORRO and WINGCALIBER while there were ot=
hers on the ground like BANTOR. <br>
<br>
Then again the PREDACONS were her=
e too, making their presence felt as they flew and walked. SKYSHADOW was in=
 the air in beast mode along with BUZZCLAW and INJECTOR, while QUICKSTRIKE =
and TERRORGATOR walked on the ground. <br>
<br>
"This way!" LEO PRIME said =
as he walked on. "The signal is coming from this way." He was carrying the =
makeshift tracking device, its signal taking him darker and darker into the=
 dark of the Jungle!<br>
<br>
OOC: I am not sure who is flying and who is w=
alking. Most I can make assumptions on. Is Hydras flying or walking, I am n=
ot sure if the Hydra has wings? Also is Buzzsaw going to be flying above th=
e trees or just below the treeline. Either one is possible, although it wil=
l call for some fancy flying to stay below as the trees get denser. <br>
<b=
r>
(TAG)<br>
<br>
Preston<br>
<br>
</p>

    </div>
